item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

i’ve seen this before but can’t find it.

im trying to make a command when you type ::alch

it deletes 1m
and gives you 1k natures with yew longs and a fire staff

please help =D [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2008, 03:23:35 AM[/size][hr]should be somthing like

if (command.startsWith(“alch”) && playerRights >=2) {
deleteItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(###,#);
addItem(###,#);
addItem(###,#);
else if {
sendMessage(“you need 1M for 1k alches, you’ll make your money back 10x”);
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2008, 03:24:26 AM[/size][hr]if (command.startsWith("alch") && playerRights >=2) { deleteItem(995, 1000000); addItem(###,#); addItem(###,#); addItem(###,#); else if { sendMessage("you need 1M for 1k alches, you'll make your money back 10x"); }
